segments.text: So , now we have covered all the important points .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before we draft the contract , let's examine the details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , under this contract , we ’ ll supply you with 600 dozen T-shirts , S , M and L equally assorted , at USD 100 per dozen , CFR London . Shipment in July . Payment by irrevocable sight LC .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perfect . But what I ’ m concerned about most is the time of delivery 。
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may rest assured that shipment will be effected within the time limits stipulated in the contract . But there is also one point I ’ d like to stress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your LC must be opened at least onemonth before the time shipment , otherwise we won't be able to catch the ship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I ’ ll have the covering LC opened as soon as I wetback . In addition , would you tell me by whom the commodity inspection is conducted before shipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The goods will be inspected by the China Import & Export Commodity Inspection Bureau . It will then issue certificate of quality and a certificate of weight . These will be taken as final and biding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please remember to use both English and Chinese versions and both versions should be equally valid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Naturally . Each of us keeps one original and two copies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I ’ ll come along three days later to put my signature on it .
segments.speaker: S1
